chat.msg: Welcome!

start at the ,map and go between the first rock and stick, cross the water over the next stick and loop around the top of the parrot following the tree outline and cross over the rocks under the parrot. then go under the frog until you reach the furthers bottom right tree and then cross the alligator, over the rock above its mouth, then the rocks to the right of the giraffe go under the giraffes feet to the next stick to cross over the snake straight to the treasure
Okay, I see the twig and the small island with the tiger on it. I am now in front of the first rock and the stick. Do I need to go right or left from here?
left
I see a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on it. Should I go towards it?
yes
I am on the small island with the tiger. What direction should I proceed now?
left
I see another big island with a parrot sitting on a tree to the left of the tiger. Should I head towards the parrot?
yes
I am on the big island with the parrot. What direction should I go now?
UP AND AROUND THE PARROT
I see 3 rocks on the south-east side of the parrot leading to a new island. Should I follow that path?
yes
I am on the new island with the frog. What should I do now?
goto the crocodile
I am on the island with the crocodile. What direction should I go now?
left
I am on the big island with the elephant. What direction should I go now?
left
I see a giraffe to the west of the elephant. Should I head towards the giraffe?
yes
I am on the island with the giraffe. What direction should I go now?
down
I see a snake two steps southeast of the giraffe. Should I go towards the snake?
yes
I am on the same island as the snake. What direction should I go now?
right
I see the treasure 2 steps to the right. Is that the destination?
yes
Great! I found the treasure! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
ok
What do you want me to do first? Can you describe my starting point and surroundings?
the white dog on the top right
Got it, I see the white dog. Should I go south towards the wooden branch or a different direction?
go right to the walking path and stop
I've found the walking path, now I'm standing there. Which way should I go next? Should I continue straight or turn somewhere?
turn back and cross the log
I'm turning back now. I see the log you were talking about. It looks a bit unstable, but I can try to cross it. Do I turn after crossing the log or go straight?
straight

Great! I crossed the log and now I'm going straight. I see another white dog sitting on a red and white picnic carpet ahead of me. Do I continue to move straight towards the picnic or do I turn somewhere?
continue towards the picnic
Okay, now I'm near the white dog and the picnic carpet. What's next? Should I go north-west towards the florist stand or a different direction?
go lef tover the next log
Got it, I'm turning left and see the next log. I'm crossing the log now. What’s next?
go around the bush and cross the bridge
I see the bush, is it okay if I pass it on the left or should I take a different route? Also, do I turn after crossing the bridge or continue moving straight?
go right and loop around the bush to the bridge and go over to the other side

Understood. I'm going around the bush to the right and now at the bridge. I'll cross it. On the other end, I see two old people sitting on a bench, reading a newspaper. Should I move towards the bench, or take a different direction?
goto the bottom of the log under them
Okay, I'm moving towards the bottom of the log under the two old people. Do I turn somewhere from there or continue straight?
go right to the deer
Great, I'm turning right now and see a brown deer! I think I've reached the end! Woohoo!
yes
Thanks for helping me reach the end. That was a fun game!
thank you
You're welcome! If you want to play again or have any other questions, just let me know.
done
Alright then, have a great day!

chat.msg: Welcome!
start at the x wehere to tent it
Got it! I see the tent right in front of me. Any directions on which way to go next?
go under the dog
Understood, I am moving south from the tent. I see a dog sitting to the left of a fire. Should I go to the left of the dog or the right?
left then the top of the grill
Great, I am going left under the dog and then north. I am now standing at the top of the grill. What should be my next move?
go right over the fire
I am now walking over the fire. I see a red mushroom towards my right, and a blue car towards my left. Where should I go?
go under the mushroom
Alright, I am walking downwards from the fire and then passing below the red mushroom. What should be the next move?
goto the windshield of the car and then go left  to the splitin the road
I have reached the windshield of the blue car and now turning left. I see a blue telescope in front of me and some rocks to its west. Is it the correct way or should I step back?
go down to the telescope on the road
Alright, I am moving south to reach the blue telescope. What now?
now go down and cut between the telescope and the bush and go under the telescope
Got it! I am heading down and walking in between the telescope and a bush. Now, I am below the telescope. What should I do next?
go left and follow the boulders to reach the cabin
Alright, I am taking a left from below the telescope and moving along the boulders towards the West. I see a wooden house at the end. Is that the final destination?
yes
Great! I am approaching the wooden house now. Thank you so much for your instructions, we made it.
good job
Thank you! It was a fun game.
yes
Do you want to play again or is there anything else I can help you with?
no
